response.original_title: Echoes of Resilience: Daughters of Two Rivers
response.overview: An artistic journey into the heart of history, identity, and collective memory, which aims to reveal the silent stories of Uzbek and Roma women. Despite their remarkable resilience, strength, and cultural richness, these women have remained in the shadows of social norms, systemic oppression, and historical neglect.
response.title: Echoes of Resilience: Daughters of Two Rivers
